siteMetadata.author: Suren
siteMetadata.about: Yes. We belive in this so strongly, that we started this organization. We see so many heroes and heroines around us every day.. doing all what they can, from where they are, with what they have. What if we lend a helping hand to them? Enable them? Give them more resources? We are sure, they will do more wonders. And that's exctly what we do.
